about_the_game:
This pack is a 3D model resource pack based on the “SMILE Characters Vol. 1” DLC for SMILE GAME BUILDER, with blend shapes and motions added by LastSmile for RPG Developer Bakin.
The more attractive characters from the previous version add even more color to the scenarios and battle scenes.

[SMILE Character DX Vol.1 - Contents]

[3D Model Details]
- Hero Characters: 3
- Heroine Characters: 3
- Animated Facial Expressions: 7 different facial expressions with blend shapes
- Motions: 61 types (covering movement, combat, standby poses, etc.)

[2D Assets Details]
- Standing Portraits: 6 (4 different facial expressions)

About Motion Data Combinations

If the motion data contained in "smilecharacter_talkevent_motion" in Resources > "Motions" is copied and used in another motion set, it may not work correctly in rare cases. This motion set is recommended for stand-alone use. Thank you in advance for your cooperation.
